8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Shaqiq narrated:"I asked Aishah about the Prophet's fasting.' She said: 'He would fast until we said: "He has fasted" and he would abstain from fasting until we said: "He has abstained from fasting." (She said:) 'The Messenger of Allah did not fast an entire month except Ramadan

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَرْدِ الصَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting Consecutive Days
